zh.title: Solana/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，短期承压]
zh.content:
当前SOL/USD价格位于118.09附近，24小时跌幅为-1.72%，显示出市场的震荡整理走势。价格波动较为平稳，且距离SMA(20)的123.257接近，表明市场未形成明显的上涨或下跌趋势。当前价格位于短期支撑区117.17附近，短期内可能会维持整理。

MACD指标显示-1.32204的值，暗示市场的下行动能仍然较强。然而，由于信号线的缺失，短期走势仍不明确，表明市场可能尚未形成明确的转折点。RSI数据缺失，无法提供更深入的超买或超卖信号。投资者需谨慎，等待更多的技术信号。

支撑位位于117.17，若跌破该价位，可能会导致进一步的下行压力，目标指向115区域。而阻力位则在120.25附近，突破该位有望回到短期上行通道。如果价格持续在这一区间内震荡，则短期内可能维持在此区间内波动。

建议投资者在当前区间内可以考虑短期交易，若价格接近支撑位时可尝试买入，但要严格设置止损，防止突破支撑位。若价格接近阻力位时，则建议考虑卖出或锁定利润，等待更明确的趋势信号。

en.title: Solana vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current market for Solana (SOL/USD) is showing a slight downtrend, with the latest price at 118.09, reflecting a 1.72% decline over the past 24 hours. This minor retracement suggests a pullback within a broader bullish structure, although the market has yet to confirm a full reversal. With the price near the lower end of the day’s range (117.17), this could present a short-term buying opportunity if it holds above this support zone.

The absence of a clear Relative Strength Index (RSI) value and a MACD that is in the negative territory (-1.32204) suggests that the momentum is weak for the time being. This lack of bullish momentum could indicate that the price may consolidate within the current range before showing any signs of a new trend. A potential reversal could be confirmed if the MACD crosses above its signal line or if the RSI starts moving into positive territory, signaling strength.

Support levels are found around 117.17, which aligns with the day’s low, while resistance is positioned at 120.25, the daily high. Traders should keep an eye on these key levels for potential breakout or breakdown points. A push above 120.25 could suggest a return to previous highs, while a drop below 117.17 would open up the possibility of testing deeper support levels further down.

For traders, the current market presents a cautious approach. A buying strategy could be viable near support with a tight stop just below 117.17. Alternatively, waiting for a break above 120.25 might provide a clearer confirmation of upward momentum. Conservative traders may opt to wait for the RSI and MACD to signal a stronger reversal before making a move.
